summary: Better fox breathe pitch and volume. Original was identical to wolves.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small mod to improve the fox breathe volume and pitch to NOT match the same sound used also for wolves as the vanilla game does.
Now you can distinguish wolves or foxes by their different breath!

[B]It\'s not a new sample[/B], I\'ve just edited the sound properties with Creation Kit.
This mod is 100% compatible with any other mod around I know of (also those that modify animals, but usually never change their default sounds).

That\'s it.
author: Hexaae

files.name: Fox breathe
files.changelogHtml: Different sound for foxes and wolves! Fox breathe volume is now lower and the pitch corrected for such a small animal.
